amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 115-698 as En Bloc No. 6: Nos. 87, 88, 89, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97, 98, 99, 100, 101, 102 and 103.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A011) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A011) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
